reviewText:
I have yet never seen a greater performer then the incomparable
Miss Patti Labelle my only gripe is that this concert was recorded
In the mid to late 1980 on old VHS format & should have been
Re-mastered to DVD format for better picture & sound quality!

This is one of the best concert tapes of Patti Labelle live. If your a collector of live soul concerts, this is one of the best! Someone out there may come close to this performance, but I know they will not be able to perform any better. Patti does it all in this concert video.
